function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases during semi-structured interviews in hospital settings","Impact":"Risk of spreading diseases to participants and researchers, leading to potential illness or infection","Mitigation":"Use of proper personal protective equipment (PPE) for both participants and researchers, implementation of strict hygiene protocols, and regular testing for infectious diseases","Technologies":"Use of air purifiers, UV-C light sterilization, and digital collaboration tools to minimize in-person interactions","People":"Participants, researchers, healthcare staff, and anyone in close proximity to the interviews","Owner":"Researchers, healthcare institutions, and funding organizations"},{"Description":"Risk of data contamination due to potential exposure to infectious agents","Impact":"Compromised data integrity and reliability, leading to skewed results and inaccurate conclusions","Mitigation":"Use of sterile equipment for data collection, regular sanitization of interview spaces, and adherence to strict infection control measures","Technologies":"Digital data collection tools, remote interview platforms, and data encryption to protect sensitive information","People":"Researchers, participants, and data analysts","Owner":"Research team and data management personnel"},{"Description":"Potential impact on public health due to unmitigated disease transmission in hospital settings","Impact":"Public health risk due to the spread of contagious diseases from hospital environments to the wider community","Mitigation":"Strict infection control measures, regular monitoring of participants and researchers for symptoms, and collaboration with public health authorities for risk assessment","Technologies":"Use of contact tracing apps, real-time health monitoring devices, and telemedicine services for early detection and intervention","People":"Community members, healthcare professionals, and public health officials","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, public health agencies, and government authorities"}]}
